body:
Hi Doug,


Documentation for Radiance source code is scant, and I can't remember  
how the stereo mode in the old SGI's worked all that well, other than  
the fact that it used two frame buffers and the pixel aspect ratio  
could change.


If you search for all occurrences of STEREO in rhd_ogl.c, you will  
find the places where code changes may be necessary, but I can't  
really advise you on what they should be for the G5 quad's stereo  
option.


If you get this to work, I'll be happy to do my part and  
reincorporate it back into the main distribution.


Best of luck!
-Greg
